metadata.name: When life gives you lemons, make a lemonadeüçã
metadata.description:
2022 was a roller coaster in my life, in NFTs, and everywhere in between. I decided to make a limited edition of one my favorite photos as a  
timestamp on the blockchain for all the tough days we surpassed and yet here we are making lemonade! 

Cheers to 2023!ü•Ç
